actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to make a grant to the city of Pawtucket, Rhode Island, for replacement and repair of the city's water transmission system.
short_title: Emergency Public Health and Drinking Water Protection Act
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Emergency Public Health and Drinking Water Protection Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to make a grant to the city of Pawtucket, Rhode Island, for replacement and repair of the city's water transmission system.

titles.title: Emergency Public Health and Drinking Water Protection Act
